title: Bison Calf Euthanized After ‘Rescue’ by Yellowstone Tourists
subtitle: Well-meaning park visitors put a calf into their vehicle to keep it warm, but rangers were unable to reunite the animal with its herd.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A bison calf was euthanized at Yellowstone National Park after well-meaning tourists put it in their car to keep it warm.
